name: Ice Trial [Post-Jam Version]
description:
Controls:

  • WASD: Movement
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Mouse Left-Click/Spacebar: Attack
  • Mouse Scroll: Swap Weapons

To obtain the legendary Ice Orb, you must conquer the Ice Trial, located in the Ice Shrine! As a Pengu, defeat the guardians that protect the sacred orb!

Project by Branchi and srg. More complete version of the "Ice Trial" demo, which was submitted to a game jam. This game is still a WIP.
